#summary Change Potato's Language

=Change Language=

You can change the language Potato runs in by selecting *Options* â†’ *Change Language*. Most messages will update instantly when the language is changed, although you may need to close and reopen some windows to have them update.

Translations of Potato are currently available in English (British and US) and Croatian, with a Spanish translation partially completed.

If you're interested in translating Potato into another language, or in updating an existing translation, you can find out how [TranslatePotato here].
